## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

- [ ] My code follows the PSR-12 coding standard
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] No PHP syntax errors (`php -l *.php`)
- [ ] My code uses strict typing (`declare(strict_types=1);`)
- [ ] All database queries use prepared statements
- [ ] Output is properly escaped with `htmlspecialchars()`
- [ ] No debugging code left in (var_dump, console.log, etc.)
- [ ] No sensitive data (credentials, API keys, etc.)
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] My changes maintain victim privacy protections
